1.0.name: wordpress/gixaw-chat
1.0.description:
Add powerful live chat to your WordPress blog. ONE-CLICK INSTALL

The KEY FEATURES are:

  • Unlimited Rooms
  • Private Chat
  • Group Chat
  • Seamless Integration with WordPress
  • Easy File Sharing
  • Live Image Previews
  • Powerful Moderation (kick / ban user / ban ip address)
  • Past Chat Transcripts
  • User Profiles and Display Pictures
  • Sound Notifications
  • Flood Control
  • Unlimited Smileys

and alot more...

This powerful, flexible solution will satisfy both you and your visitors. You can even integrate it with your WordPress blog without hosting the chat on your server. Visit http://www.gixawchat.com/ for more details.
